aka: Stenbeck: A Biography of a Successful Businessman

cast.name: 雅各布·奥福特布罗 Jakob Oftebro

writer.name: 亚历克斯·哈里迪 Alex Haridi

trans_title: Stenbeck: A Biography of a Successful Businessman
introduction: The show charts Stenbeck’s “transformative 1970s New York years to his meteoric rise and enduring legacy in Sweden’s media landscape. It chronicles the high-stakes deals, groundbreaking innovations, and the family rivalries that shaped his life.At 35, Jan Stenbeck appears to have it all: a prestigious career at Morgan Stanley, a glamorous life in New York, and a budding romance with American socialite Merrill McCloud. But when tragedy strikes his family in Sweden, he is thrust into a leadership role at Kinnevik, the family’s prestigious industrial group. What follows is a high stakes battle between tradition and innovation, as Jan’s visionary ideas clash with his siblings conservative approach. His relentless pursuit of success leads to groundbreaking ventures in media and telecom, including breaking Sweden’s telephone monopoly and launching TV3. However, his meteoric rise comes at a cost. Haunted by loneliness and strained family ties, Jan’s life is as tumultuous as it is transformative.
